headline: Kimberly-Clark Kenvue Deal Reshapes Growth Story And Investor Trade Offs
summary: Kimberly-Clark, ticker NasdaqGS:KMB, has announced its intention to acquire Kenvue to create a combined consumer health and personal care company. The proposed deal would bring together well known household brands in a single group, subject to regulatory approvals and final transaction terms. Management is highlighting expected cost savings and potential earnings benefits from the combination. For investors watching NasdaqGS:KMB, this move comes as the shares trade around $111.11. The stock...
